00005 function __autoload($className) {
00006         // If DAO class, remove the ending 'DAO'
00007         $classFile = substr($className,-3)=='DAO' ? substr($className,0,-3) : $className;
00008         // This now works from everywhere
00009         $classFilePath = $_SERVER['DOCUMENT_ROOT'];
00010         //echo "cfp = $classFilePath";
00011         $classFileLongName = 'na1-matrix/models/'.$classFile.'.php';
00012         //echo "cft = ".$classFilePath.'/'.$classFileLongName;
00013         if (file_exists($classFilePath.'/'.$classFileLongName))
00014                 require_once $classFilePath.'/'.$classFileLongName;
00015         else 
00016                 throw new Exception("The class named $className does not exist !");
00017 }

00019 abstract class ModelDAO
00020 {
00021         // common to all ModelDAO instances :
00022         
00023         static protected $db = NULL; // Singleton database connection
00024         
00025         static protected $_daos; // List of all currently used DAOs
00026         static private $_currentDaoName=''; // name of the current DAO
00027         
00028         private $_modelName; // Model name
00029         
00030         protected function __construct()
00031         {
00032                 $this->_modelName = $this->getModelName(); // ex : 'ModelDAO' --> 'Model'
00033                 
00034                 if (self::$db == NULL)
00035                         self::$db = new DbConnector();
00036                         
00037                 self::set($this);
00038                         
00039         }
00040         
00041         static public function getDB()
00042         {
00043                 return self::$db;
00044         }
00045         
00046         static private function set(ModelDAO $dao) {
00047                 self::$_daos[get_class($dao)] = $dao;
00048         }
00049         
00050         static public function getFromName($daoName) {
00051                 if (strtoupper(substr($daoName, -3)) != 'DAO') $daoName.='DAO';
00052                 if (!isset(self::$_daos[$daoName])) { 
00053                         // create a new ModelDAO instance (will be UNIQUE and used by all other Models)
00054                         echo "NEW ";
00055                         echo "class = $daoName <br>";
00056                         self::set(new $daoName()); // ATTENTION: not allowed if ModelDAO constructor is private
00057                 }
00058                 return self::$_daos[$daoName];
00059         }
00060         
00061         static public function getCurrent() {
00062                 return self::$_daos[self::$_currentDaoName];
00063         }
00064         
00065         static public function setCurrent($daoName) {
00066                 self::$_currentDaoName = $daoName;
00067         }
00068         
00069         function getModelName() { // ex : for GroupDAO --> model is "Group"
00070                 return substr(get_class($this), 0,-3);
00071         }
